posts.content:
Ok it's on ebay as I don't really know what to ask for it. Item no: 170625681609

I think its a slight variation on the standard devons as the sliding cupboard fits in the rear side above the engine bay.

Does need some TLC and a bit of repair work

Â£800 o.n.o.

Thanks Jon

Hi , sorry but you do need to follow the rules for selling on the forum, Thanks

"Please read the following for sale guidelines".

firstly absolutly no "offers"! a price followed by "or offers" is acceptable.
(if your unsure of an asking price then post up with an ono "or nearest offer"

location is a must!!!

links to ebay are just as bad as posts not having prices on and are just plain frustrating
was this on ebay a few months ago ?

maddison wrote:
was this on ebay a few months ago ?


No not this one

wow,, they are pretty rare the non walkthrew torvettes (i think - or is it devonette???) anyways, was one on ebay not long ago, but with cushions i think

like buses none for ages then 2 pop up


good look with the sale, looks like a real nice interior for someone that does, shame is missing the end of the seat where the easicool goes, but they come up for sale now and again - really good basis for a pretty rare interior
